website_summaries.verdict: The combination of nice features and a reasonable price make this ionic hair dryer worth considering despite its known quirks.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for its surprisingly quiet operation
Infrared heat technology does a great job controlling frizz
Comes at a decent price point
cons: Feels somewhat heavy, making it awkward to control when in use
Nozzle attachment has a tendency to come loose

website_summaries.verdict: A powerful yet quiet hair dryer that won't break the bank.
pros: Takes up less space on the vanity or in a suitcase
Includes a concentrator attachment for straight styles and diffuser for curly or course hair
Negative ion technology seriously de-frizzes hair
cons: Is a bit heavy to hold for some users, but others appreciate the dryer's "sturdiness

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRICE FOR THE BEST BLOW DRYER
customer_reviews.text: I received the blow dryer as a gift, this is by far the best blow dryer I have ever owned or used professionally. I am a retired stylist and salon owner of 20 years. As a result of the injury I could no longer do hair professionally. I could only style a few people at a time friends and family. Prior to the injury I was a very busy stylist with the need and want of the best implements of my profession. I had spent a $100 and more on blow dryers how wish this blow dryer at this price would've been available to me at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Dunn

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a few weeks but so far it has been good. Switching to this blow dryer has cut down on some major frizz issues I was fighting with my last blow dryer. I have been able to get smooth, straight hair with just this and my trusty round brush which is saying a lot because I usually have to straight iron my hair after I blow it out to tame the frizz. I would definitely suggest buying this blow dryer if you have thick, wavy, frizzy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Good hairdryer ... Great seller
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hairdryer. I have long thick hair that takes about 20-30 minutes to dry. The dryer never overheats or blows too hot to damage my hair. I was disappointed when the low air flow setting stopped working just over a year after my purchase. The replacement warranty is a year so I emailed the company to see what the limited warranty was for this dryer. The customer service was quick and beyond my expectations. They are sending me a new hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyan

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I've had this hair dryer for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I've had this hair dryer for a couple of months now and have never had an issue. The settings are perfect and I love that I dont have to hold down a button to have cold hair. I 100% recommend this piece. I use it all the time to diffuse my curls and always get compliments when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Surprise - I Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't remember the last time I used a hair dryer - maybe 50+ years ago? My hair is curly and very, very fine and fragile. I'm in the mid-'70s now and allowing my hair to grow loooong for the first time. What with hot and humid days, I need some help to tame this curly mane and bring it under some semblance of 'control'. I looked at many dryers, and this one seemed to be the most versatile. I LOVE the diffuser! Haven't made a picture yet, will see, once I learn to use this tool with skill and finesse. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: EABaldwin

customer_reviews.title: ... - it is not light weight but it feels good in your hand
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly balanced - it is not light weight but it feels good in your hand. Has very nice attachments that fit well - A diffuser for my daughters curly hair and a cap that helps me straighten my hair. All the buttons work well and you can easily operate them without looking - also, love the infrared - it really speeds up drying time!
customer_reviews.author: E Mont

customer_reviews.title: It's broke within a year.
customer_reviews.text: It was not low noise, pretty loud so I've been using at a low setting all the time. A month ago suddenly changed to high heat by Low setting. Then the handle became very hot which hard to hold and starting smell of burning wire. It's waisting my money. I wish I could've returned and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Buyer

customer_reviews.title: This hair dryer blew me away!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this purchase. This hair dryer exceeds all of my expectations. It is truly salon quality and extremely quiet. Because it runs hotter than other dryers that I have used it takes far less time to dry my hair and it leaves it shiny and manageable. I would recommend this dryer without reservation. Thank you, Amazon, for making this purchase so easily available!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's quiet and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairdryer! I wanted quiet and did my homework on decibels - but also didn't want the 'whine' that even low decibel hairdryers can put out. I took the chance and absolutely love it. It's also powerful, and a small thing - but the nozzle attachment actually fits snugly and I don't think will fall off. The outside material is also really nice - it feels almost like rubber - a nice grip versus cheap plastic. It is heavier than I would have liked for travel or gym bag - but compact. I purchased a second one I loved it so much. Highly recommend for anyone sensitive to the loud, painful noise from hairdryers.
customer_reviews.author: CamRun

customer_reviews.title: I have always hated trying to blow dry my hair in the morning ...
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer works amazingly well for my hair. I have always hated trying to blow dry my hair in the morning because it usually takes me FOREVER and nobody has time for that. I gave this blow dryer a try after my old one broke down and let me tell you, I am impressed. I have thick hair so I normally wear my hair wet one day to let it air dry and then the next day I will style it, normally with my hair straightener. I can use this dryer with a brush and I can blow dry my hair wet in about the same time that I can straighten it dry. So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Looks are not everything. Misinformation. Please note this hairdryer is just as noisy as a $10 hair dryer. Not worth the monies paid. Plus the buttons are on the handle and they easily switch from hot to warm or from high to low. Consequently I don’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Moraima

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: This is NOT A Dual Voltage Appliance
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is mislabelled. It is NOT dual volatge: it is for North American use only. There is a switch on it that LOOKS like it will change the voltage, but the switch is non-functional. It's a shame that Amazon allows this mislabelling to continue.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Solo

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: First time using it today after using expensive Rusk CTC lite for years. Although this one is heavier, it cut down drying time by half and my hair feels healthier and shiny. I received 30% off coupon so it was a really good deal. Hopefully lasts longer than the Rusk brand. Only giving it 4 stars for weight. Really 4 1/2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy N.

customer_reviews.title: Awkward feel
customer_reviews.text: Have had for almost a year and I still can’t get used to the awkward feel. I don’t notice that it dries my hair any faster or is any quieter than any of my other 30.00 hairdryers and I paid twice as much for this one. What I like the least is how Unergonomically friendly it is. I can’t think of anything I actually like about it.
customer_reviews.author: KeysBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Love !
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than most hair dryers this size. Smaller than most full size dryers but larger than a compact folding one. Quieter than most dryers period. Powerful and good hearing power, dries hair well and effectively. Highly recommend this hair dryer for every day home use if you want to be efficient but effective and you don’t like obnoxiously loud hair dryers or super heavy ones your arm gets tired using
customer_reviews.author: Sam Brady

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product, I was very satisfied that it did not let me down as the quality matches the picture of the product. It is very solid and my sister is really happy with it because I got it for her as a gift. Her old dryer has been failing on her and she likes this gift not only because it is new but also it is much better than her old one. She also likes the accessories that come with it. The multi-setting certainly makes a big difference in the hair and one just have to try it then compare it to feel the differences.
customer_reviews.author: Ishtar

customer_reviews.title: Fire
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years only, it sparkled from the handle and stopped working. Lucky that it didnt catch on fire and burn my head off
customer_reviews.author: Junsuk oh

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great, crappy nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good, strong airflow Multiple heat settings Multiple power settings Long cord for extended reach Diffuser and Nozzle attachments Cons: THE NOZZLE IS LOOSE AND WILL SPIN AND SPIN Love everything about this blow dryer except the nozzle- the dang thing won't stay put. The whole point of the nozzle is to control the direction of the air flow to help eliminate frizz- this is pointless because no matter how you position the nozzle, it will just spin around as gravity pulls the heaviest side down. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Yrallih

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I’m delighted with this dryer. I was concerned about how efficient it would be because it’s shockingly small. It’s not just a compact travel hair dryer, it’s a miniature hair dryer. But it works better than my current full size dryer, and I am seriously considering getting a full sized one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Worth to try
customer_reviews.text: Usually we grab hair dryer from Walmart, somehow my previous hair dryer always broken by itself every other years.This time I searched on Amazon and saw this high rating hair dryer. It is slightly bigger but it has cold air option which I like to use in summer.After one week use, I found even without applying conditioner, my hair is smooth.I didn't expected hair actually can getting smoother without changing shampoo and conditioner. Within similar price range, I believe it is worth to try this MHD hair dry and it is only less than $40.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Good hair dryer, just not that quiet
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer has great air flow and dries quickly. The controls are easy to use on the handle. The only downside is it is not as quiet as I had hoped. The 70-74 db sound level is at the low setting which still has incredible air flow. The high setting is louder at about 80-85 db using a smartphone decibel meter. This a solid product that is a little heavier than typical hair dryers but it feels well built.
customer_reviews.author: yframe

customer_reviews.title: Died within a year
customer_reviews.text: I loved this hairdryer for almost a year. The handle did take some getting used to, but it's more quiet than all the dryers I've had before. It has good power and didn't fry my hair on high heat. But, I am sad to say it sparked, started smoking then died completely yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Chervack

customer_reviews.title: Great blow dryer and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blow dryer! It is a little loud, but it works so good I don’t care! I love the diffuser attachment and use it daily to enhance my natural wave my hair has. The seller is awesome! I recently dropped my diffuser on my tile floor and it chipped the piece that connects it to the dryer so it wouldn’t stay on very good, kept falling off. I contacted the seller to find out how to order a new diffuser and they are sending me a new one free of charge! Now that is above and beyond customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Quiet???? Like a jet engine is quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my wife who asked for a quiet blow dryer. It sounds a little like a jet engine and is certainly not quiet. I am very disappointed in the purchase and would return it if the window had not already passed. We will have to dispose of this one because her hearing is more important than the investment. Don’t recommend this to anyone who is not already deaf.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Seller, but still a very loud hair dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't love this dryer. I have course (for a white girl) hair, medium curly. Dryer did not get hot enough on the low setting - you need to run on high which curly girls generally don't do. High setting sounds like a jet engine by your head, terribly loud. Update: Seller was extremely helpful. They thought I had likely received a damaged / faulty drier so they offered to refund my order or send me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kallie

customer_reviews.title: Low setting only for International use
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a great dryer. But I need high heat to dry my hair which is quite thick. The website info and reviews did not state that only the LOW heat setting works on the 250v setting. I tried the low setting here at home, and it's simply not enough (a nice warm breeze isn't enough for my hair). I know this is common, but I gambled--and lost. So I'm returning it. Oh well. I gave it 3 stars because it's probably a great dryer for most people, but I wish the information had been more complete.
customer_reviews.author: Squarepeg

customer_reviews.title: I’m very pleased with my purchase because of its light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Great little dryer! On high it has the same power as my full size dryer. Going to the cooler option it does lower the speed, but the cool shot seems to be full force. I bought it for everyday use because of the light weight, and that it is. My hand doesn’t get tired and yet my hair gets dry in same time as my full sized, maybe even faster. Solid construction, handy closing handle, so it takes up little space, and the safety plug I like to use in the bathroom. I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Best hair dryer I ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best hair dryer I have ever owned!! I normally have crazy frizzy hair but this hair dryer actually helps to make my hair straight and a lot more tame!! It has a lot of power and the red infralight is what helps to make your hair straight I believe. I've had it for a while now and it's still in great condition. Very durable and I'm very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice dryer - just wish the diffuser was a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thick, curly hair. I recently got a haircut from a curly hair expert (who knew there were such people!??) and she taught me I needed a diffuser for my dryer. I bought this duo, and it works well. The dryer gets pretty warm, but not as hot as the one she used in the salon. And I wish the diffuser attachment was a little bigger, so I could plop more hair into it when drying.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Strong but gentle and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful yet low sound blow dryer. My hair seems healthier and less damaged since using it. I use the low setting on high heat and my hair looks smooth and shiny. Even my dogs appreciate the low sound and and sit happily for a blow dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Features, not "Low Noise"
customer_reviews.text: This dryer has very good options (warm/hot/cool, low/high air flow) for controlling temperature and air flow and my girlfriend really does like it. The only problem I have with it is that it's definitely *not* low noise. It is much louder than my old dryer and than my girlfriend's prior favorite, the Pro Beauty Tools model PBDR5882. But she uses and prefers this MHD dryer because of its features, which work really well for her. Just don't this "Low Noise" if you buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lee

customer_reviews.title: So-So for the price
customer_reviews.text: This dryer doesn't get "hot" only very warm. At first I was very disappointed but I'm guessing that much heat isn't good for my hair anyway. But .... I love how soft and shiny my hair is after using this dryer. Pros: Leaves hair soft and shiny Reasonable dry time Cons: Large and bulky Doesn't get "hot" Switches need to be designed so you're not constantly, accidentally turning if off. You have to hold the body of the dryer (not the handle) which is awkward for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but....
customer_reviews.text: My last hair dryer was much quieter on the high setting, but louder on the low setting. I'm happy with the dryer and it works very well. I wish the high setting was more quiet and the placement of the high/low switch is in an inconvenient spot - nearly every time I use the dryer I inadvertently hit the switch and change the setting. It's a minor annoyance and why I didn't give the product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Barbarii

customer_reviews.title: Only Okay
customer_reviews.text: This dryer kicks out a LOT of air - so much that my long and fine hair tangles hopelessly, regardless of how careful I am. It is quieter than other dryers I've used. The biggest problem is that the attachments are completely worthless. It is nearly impossible to get the diffuser onto the dryer. In fact, I've only succeeded once in these past few months. It is full-sized, so traveling with it is out of the question.
customer_reviews.author: The Musical Chef

customer_reviews.title: Dries even thick hair FAST!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this hair dryer. I've had it for nearly 6 months now, and it dries faster than any other dryer I've had in the past. It is quiet enough (not super, but not high pitched where it hurts your ears). The only semi strange thing is the glowing red light when you have it on hot. It freaks out one of my cats (the other one is fine with it).
customer_reviews.author: HappyTrippinMamma

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for a quiet, lightweight, user friendly ion hairdryer. This dryer does dry very well but it blows too hard. My hair is fine and it tangles it on the high setting. The low setting is better but takes longer to dry. The speed and temperature settings on the handle are not in the best place. My hand kept turning the buttons on and off while trying to dry. The weight is heavy and it isn't as quiet as I hoped unless you only dry on low. The diffuser is very difficult to put on and take off. I am returning the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Hairdryer is lighter than others i have owned and does ...
customer_reviews.text: Hairdryer is lighter than others i have owned and does not make my hair frizzy. Drys fast and results are smooth hair.
customer_reviews.author: Betty C

customer_reviews.title: Infrared really works!
customer_reviews.text: I've got alot of fine, wavy, shoulder-length hair. It's also highlighted & Brazilian blown out in the summer. THIS dryer is close to a Brazilian, & we all know what that costs. With this dryer I can dry my hair in 10 minutes, its not frizzy, I don't need to flat iron it, & after using it for a month, I'm still amazed! P.S. It isn't hot, either!
customer_reviews.author: finney

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many hair dryers, and this is the best! I have long hair which is thick in the back. It used to take at least 30 minutes (or more) to dry. This dryer dries it so quickly, even on just warm heat. On high heat, it takes care of the thick air on high in less than a minute. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C.R. Bounds

customer_reviews.title: An absolute gem!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dryer for eleven months, and have had no problems with it whatsoever. It's used a minimum of five days a week, using all temperatures, speeds and the cool blast button. Absolutely love the long cord, which allows complete maneuverability without pulling short or getting tangled up. Dries hair quickly, and finishing off with the cool blast button leaves incredible shine. Would absolutely purchase this dryer again.
customer_reviews.author: Flecia

customer_reviews.title: Little in Size but Big in Power
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair dryer I have ever purchased!it's lightweight and gets the job done. I was a little worried because travel hair dryers aren't always the strongest but this one far exceeded my expectations and works better than my full size dryer I purchased at Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Not that quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be quieter. Cool button is in an awkward place on the dryer. I keep pressing it by mistake. But dries quickly. Saves me time in the morning. All in all a good product and a good value. I really wanted a quiet one so as not to wake hubby and it’s not that quiet. But he doesn’t care as it turns out as he’s still asleep when I’m done:)
customer_reviews.author: Travel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Quieter, but also weaker and heavier than most dryers
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is quiet and that’s the main reason I bought it. I use it mostly to warm up my hands and feet in the winter since I rarely dry my hair. It is heavy for a dryer and would be exhausting to use on your head if you have lots of hair. It’s also lower power, so it takes longer to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this dryer however the low speed blew out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I like this dryer however the low speed blew out quickly. I requested to be able to purchase a new one before sending this back was told I could however they request me sending it back first. The dryer seems to have blades hitting the side and the motor slows down when held with nozzle pointed down. This is a very quiet dryer when on low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, especially on low
customer_reviews.text: As a man, this is one of the best dryers that I have found. What I like most about is the low noise level which lives up to the advertisement and the cool mode which is great in the summer. The heat levels are very comfortable and not over powering especially for my head with thinning hair and more than enough to quickly dry my hair. Rather large for traveling therefore given only 3 stars but it is great for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: I like design of this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I like design of this hair dryer. There are warm/cool settings in the dryer that you can choose from them. One special thing about this dryer is that there is one cap at the air inlet so that my hairs will be no longer sucked into dryer. I recommend this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing that beats a far infrared load dryer instead of using the concept of evaporating the water in the hair that turns the water to a vapor making it dry even faster still leading moisture inside the hair shaft as for what I use it for I can’t believe they asked that question obviously for drying here😉
customer_reviews.author: susan ijames

customer_reviews.title: More bounce to the ounce!
customer_reviews.text: SO FREAKING WORTH THE BUY! I'm a woman of color with thick, coarse hair. The concentrator works beautifully. I use products to protect against heat. Left my hair very soft, straight with lots of body!
customer_reviews.author: Caprice Classic

customer_reviews.title: Nice dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far! Doesn’t get super hot like the old dyers do so it doesn’t dry your scalp as much. Love the size, very lightweight. Only con is that the buttons are on the inside of the handle so you do occasionally turn it off while using it. Different heads screw on dyer which makes it impossible for it to come off while using and that’s great!!!
customer_reviews.author: MFS1!

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Nice dryer, small yet powerful. If you travel overseas with this, be careful because it does not operate on 240vac. This dryer is USA 115vac only. Make sure your overseas adapter steps down to 115vac
customer_reviews.author: MSC

customer_reviews.title: Loved until stopped working after only 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: First off, this review is after a year of owning this blow dryer. I loved that it is lightweight and folds to be compact. But after a year of use, the high setting started to not work. 2 months after that, the high setting doesn’t turn on at all. Not happy that this blow dryer only worked for one year. 🤔😞 Maybe I got a faulty one? Who knows. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Loud
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a blow dryer that was quiet and light weight! This dryer was advertised as such! It is NOT quiet and it's heavy. I set the dry setting on low/warm and it's more cool then warm! Hot is VERY hot. I also use the Low dry setting to help reduce the loudness .... the low setting is still higher than it should be. I am disappointed and will never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Sanera

customer_reviews.title: Great hairdryer!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new hairdryer so when I came across this one, I thought I'd give it a try. So glad I did because I love it! My hair is long and was really surprised at how fast it dried my hair. Also, my hair feels so much softer and has more shine than ever before. It's light weight, has enough setting choices and also includes two attachments. Can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jan H

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Sorry this review was about a year in the making. Works great, and has every other day for over a year now. My hair is to my pockets on my Jean's, drys it quickly, evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy .R.

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable and smooth feeling!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love this blowdryer! It's quieter than the one we had previously and the infrared dries hair so much faster and leaves it shinier! It does weigh a little more but you don't have to hold it as long!
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair dryer, had a million before it and this one dries quickly and less fly-aways afterward. Wish I would have found this sooner. Leaves hair smooth and not frizzy, great for my hair as it tends to dry out with so much blow-drying, but since this quickly dries the hair it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa J Modestine

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: very good hair drier I still use it since last 4 yrs didn't got any problem. powerful and quick drying
customer_reviews.author: Steffi Barretto

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet!!
customer_reviews.text: Not quiet!! I bought this because I needed to replace a Conair that was actually quiet. You can't have a conversation and use this at the same time, or listen to the news (as I do in the mornings while blowdrying). It's the same volume as a regular hair dryer. The only reason I give it two stars is that I appreciate there is a 'medium' heat setting.
customer_reviews.author: savvychick

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer works fastest for drying my relatively long hair than I have ever owned, so I am giving it the highest rating. It is heavier & louder than most, but I feel the drying speed otherwise makes it still excellent. It has a very long cord . Another benefit I feel worth mentioning is that is has a full one year warranty. I definitely recommend this product as I am very pleased with how well it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fast dryer! Cuts down on drying time. Long cord.
customer_reviews.text: I love this blow dryer. I have thick, somewhat fine hair and it used to take about 20 minutes right after showering to dry. Now it takes about 12. Amazing! Quality also seems good and has a long cord which is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: MyMorningCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Only alright
customer_reviews.text: I think the infrared heat is a gimmick. It takes almost twice as long to blow dry my hair with this one. That being said my hair is less frizzy after drying now. Pros: Small size Looks nice Powerful Cons: Heavy! Awkward button placement on the handle - I often accidently turn it off Cord unplugs from the wall easily Vibrates - my hand is tingly by the time I'm done
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern123

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blow dryer, dries fast on low, not noisy either!
customer_reviews.text: Have not purchased a new blow dryer in decades but this one's excellent. On low it dries my fine hair in less than a minute. Not to noisy either. i would buy this again if mine disappears!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great little hair dryer here and very convenient for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great little hair dryer here and very convenient for travel. I'll let you know as I spend more time with it and he gets more wear and tear how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Bryndon Preston

customer_reviews.title: No Frizz, NOT quiet
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this as it claimed to be a quiet dryer. If you are looking at it for the "quietness", this is NOT the dryer for you. It is regular sounding. BUT...I didn't return it because it helps my wavy/curly hair not be frizzy...so that's a win.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Y

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet; strange light!
customer_reviews.text: I really need a quiet hair dryer due to my migraines. Not only is this dryer not quiet, it also has a bright light that comes on every time the heat setting is used (I think it has to do with the ions). It really scared me the first time! As anyone with migraines knows, loud noises and light are excruciatingly painful; the combination even worse. As far as the hair dryer itself, I found it only worked so-so. Not impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mdmd523

customer_reviews.title: Was surprised at how much better this dryer is than some of the typical ones ...
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how much better this dryer is than some of the typical ones seen in stores...My other one got smoke in the wire and could have caused a fire! So this time, I read reviews, but also looked up ratings...this one, for the price, was the answer...AND it dries hair faster, and style is more controlled with the red light that goes on...And it IS less noisy!! Good find and glad I got it - Life's just easier when you can blow your hair faster too.
customer_reviews.author: KSherm

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dryer for 2.5 years and have used it virtually every day. Worked great until recently when it stopped drying on the low setting, and when drying on the highest heat setting the heat switches on and off randomly. Then I started noticing a hot electric smell so I'm throwing it away. I expect a hair dryer to last longer than 2.5 years, hence the bad rating. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LOHawk

customer_reviews.title: Had this product for several months and works great in USA
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for several months and works great in USA. Went to Europe and could not get it to work. Used currency adaptor and tried with out adaptor. Either way it should have worked. Came back to USA and works OK.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 years...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for 3 years. It has worked beautifully until now. The low setting won’t work anymore, so high blast is the only option. It’s pretty loud and a bit heavy, but if those things don’t bother you, I’d say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It is a nice size and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: It is a little more quiet than the other hair dryers we have, just what I was looking for. We had not had a new hair dryer for years. My husband was impressed with how well it is made. It is a little heaver than most but, I love it. It is a nice size, quieter and made better than any hair dryer I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Veneskey

customer_reviews.title: I'm a bit disappointed. I loved this hairdryer for the past year
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit disappointed. I loved this hairdryer for the past year, but almost exactly one year to the day, the "high-low" switch shorted out, and stuck in the "high" position. I had to stop using it, as it had that electrical short kind of smell. The last dryer I had lasted me years, so I expected this one to last at least another year.
customer_reviews.author: CynDS

customer_reviews.title: Only held up for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dryer last June and have totally loved it for the size and settings with my long thick hair that is hard to dry. However, it has now stopped working on the low setting and has made some popping noises (after only using it for 8 months). I even keep the double filters on the back clean of dust and hair so I'm not sure why it would be having problems. I do use it almost every day but am very disappointed that at this price, it didn't last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith McGrady

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Hair dries in half the time. I also love the red light showing you where you are pointing the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine hair and this model seems to blow dry my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am digging this hair dryer! I have very fine hair and this model seems to blow dry my hair without any accompanying frizz. It must be that "negative ionic" feature. I do wish the cord was retractable because it's kind of long. But, that's merely a first world problem. This is probably the best hair dryer I've ever had and honestly, I don't think a lot about hair dryers.
customer_reviews.author: marylouwho27

customer_reviews.title: Quiet/Compact - not so much....
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is simply not as promoted. It is not at all quieter in any way than my full-size dryer, and it is marginally compact (but certainly not what I would consider a travel size). There is only one heat setting (and to be fair, the product description did not indicate multiple settings) but the heat coming out of this unit is HOT! There is no way I would ever dry my hair at that temperature. So, I'm giving this product 2 stars because it does work, I just wouldn't ever use it on my hair, and that it is quiet and compact are both false claims.
customer_reviews.author: S.Plath

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer in April 2018 and last week it suddenly stopped working. It is a little heavier than most hair dryers and the air was more forceful than my last one but it was strong enough that i didnt need my hair straightener anymore. I will not be purchasing again though based on it doesn't last long enough for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha S.

customer_reviews.title: It has a DIFFUSER!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god I can't expect more for this hair dryer! It's professonal, it's ionic and the best part is, it has a diffuser! Usually a hair dryer wouldn't come with a diffuser, but this one does! So far I've been loving it! I'm recommending it to my roommate lol
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: While heavier than cheaper plastic dryers it seems well-balanced in the hand, comfortable. The metal stays cool while in use. I use the low/warm setting on my hair. It' s the perfect temperature. Really good product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Scott

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but NOT a 'quiet' model.
customer_reviews.text: This dryer works just fine, and I quite like the smaller size of it. However, it was advertised as "quiet", which is the only reason I purchased it in the first place, but I've found that it's actually louder than all of my other blow dryers that don't have that selling point. Quite let down, but for the price I can't complain that much. I'll definitely still be using it, just wish it was actually quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Concentrator Attachment Falls Off Constantly
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hair dryer. However, I only purchased it because it came with a concentrator attachment to help style my hair. The concentrator attachment will NOT stay on the hair dryer. The slightest bump, or often even just normal hair dryer movement, will cause the attachment to fall off. Each time that happens, I have to turn off the hair dryer, find the attachment, and put it back on the hair dryer. Repeat until great annoyance ensues. Very very disappointing .
customer_reviews.author: kapwingg

customer_reviews.title: I love this hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairdryer. I enjoy all the settings it has. I diffuse my curly hair and I needed to be able to use a medium heat, plus a cool blast setting to alternate between. This hairdryer has them both. I also love that my drying time is cut in half! The only downside is that the dryer is a little heavier then I'd like, but I sit on a bench when I dry my hair so it doesn't affect me much.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Lawson

customer_reviews.title: I love this hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairdryer! I never thought I'd say that about ANY hairdryer. I love the professional feel to it, but what's even better is how quickly it dries my hair, AND it also seems to 'style' it without much fuss. (I'm a "wash and go" kinda girl.) I'm also really appreciating the fact that it doesn't sounds like an airplane engine, and no doubt my neighbors are appreciating it too at 7am.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and weak...but has a head!
customer_reviews.text: Was not as powerful as it said it would be, tinier than we thought it would be. Not good for thick long hair. We still had to buy converters, it should have come with a set. Lastly the slide button that changed the wattage was very hard to move- you will need tools for it. I'd keep looking for something better. I like that it had a head...which is rare in an international usable blowdryer thats why it got two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora2731

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combination! I used to have to either straighten ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have wavy hair that gets frizzy from blow drying, this is the dryer for you. I purchased the SUPRENT Nano Thermal Ceramic & Ionic round brush to use with this dryer. Perfect combination! I used to have to either straighten or curl my hair after blow drying just to reduce frizz but not with these two products. My hair has body and shine now after just drying. What a huge time saver!! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! When wanting the higher heat you have to use the high blow setting so my thin hair get matted! Two settings only and the switch is were you place hold it and it accidentally shuts off! Frustrating and not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Todd

customer_reviews.title: It's portable for on the go
customer_reviews.text: It's great for travel and home usage. Its powerful enough to dry your hair that it won't burn you.
customer_reviews.author: Allisen

customer_reviews.title: fine hair) after drying with this dryer than others I ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm loving it! It's a little bit heavier than my last blow dryer, however, the cord is long, comes with it's own tie (no more broken cords from wrapping it around the dryer), the accessories don't fall off when it's in use, quick drying time....and...for me, my hair is less frizzy (I have a lot of long, fine hair) after drying with this dryer than others I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very good for fine treated hair
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Ideal for fine and delicate hair as mine. Very powerfull without causing any damage to the hair. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value. Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. It dries fast and is a good value for the awesome quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wes & Darby McFall

customer_reviews.title: Great Hairdryer!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hairdryer! The nozzle is narrow so you really don’t need the air flow director attachment. Buttons are easy to control with dryer hand. The infrared technology does make my hair shinier. I don’t notice that it’s any quieter than any other dryer I’ve used, but that’s not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynne

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be way better...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dryer for the last 8 months and worked great. Recently the handle where it folds no longer stands straight by the swivel, so have to hold it by the main head which gets very hot. No customer service available for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Really love this blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Really love this blow dryer. It has cut down my drying time quite significantly. I have only used it 2 times but have been impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Cool

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line quality.
customer_reviews.text: This might be the best hair blowdryer I've ever owned. The whole thing looks sleek and has a matted look and smooth plastic feel. It is really sturdy and has hot, warm, cool air setting which you can set to low or high speeds. It took only seconds to get from dripping wet hair to adequately dry hair. Highly recommended and happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! What took me 15-20 minutes with my old torumaline dryer (which was not cheap) now takes less than five minutes with this blow dryer. I have long thick hair to the middle of my back and blow drying was always a chore, this blow dryer makes me want to do my hair!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky with what hair tools I use since I have very fine hair but I LOVE this dryer. Love that it comes with two attachments and my hair is shinier with this dryer than any I've had in the past. Would purchase again if for some reason broke!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I did not know what a good hair dryer was like or the importance of one until i got this one. Exactly as describe. It felt like a salon blowout and reduced the amount of work I had to do afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: CitizenContrary

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer because it comes with 2 attachments - the diffuser and the concentrator. This is definitely the best hair dryer I've ever owned. It's a bit heavy, but I think it's that way because it's made well. I have thick hair, and it dries my hair much faster than any hair dryer I've had in the past. I'm a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months and then quit.
customer_reviews.text: Started out as a great hair dryer. But 6 months in, started turning itself off and overheating. I checked to make sure it wasn't a lint filter issue, and that didn't seem to be the problem. I don't overuse it. Only dry my hair for about 5 minutes, and I don't use it every day. I liked the compact design, so I'm sad that it didn't last. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty handy hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty handy hair dryer, small but powerful. Perfect to carry when traveling. My husband also likes to use it for our little puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Dancing flower

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have had many hair dryers in the past and all were disappointing. The MHU Professional is amazing! I really like the speed and heat controls but for me, the diffuser is the most important. The diffuser on this dryer is outstanding! Best dryer I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R. Demeules

product_meta.title: MHU Professional Salon Grade 1875w Low Noise Ionic Ceramic Ac Infrared Heat Hair Dryer Plus One Concentrator and One Diffuser Black Color
feature_bullets: ★1875-watt AC Motor - reduces drying time up , as it ensures low noise and vibration.
★2 Speeds, 3 Heat Settings - for controlled airflow and heat, ensuring amazing results for all hair types and textures.
★Far-Infrared Heat and Negative Ion Technology - to dry hair faster while eliminating frizz for a perfect smooth style and reducing the risk of damage.
★Airflow Concentrator and Diffuser - For styling and touch-ups, we've included two smart attachments that help you accelerate drying, add volume and minimize frizz.
★Ready And Able - an easy grip, 9 foot cord made of heat-proof, and a professional hook makes use and storage simple.

specifications.Manufacturer: Shenzhen Jinri Electrical Appliances Co., Ltd

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
